Question: MEMS Corp. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MEMS Corp.

MEMS Gas Sensor

- Contactless thermal conductivity sensor
- 2mm size for hydrogen detection
- CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree in Sustainability, Eco-Design & Smart Energy

MEMS hybrid micromotor

- First micromotor designed for electronics
- Recognized for Embedded Technologies at CES 2024

TDK Corp.

- Range of new MEMS sensors for various applications
- Advanced edge ML solution
- InvenSense Smart Industrial IIM-42653 with 6-axis/3-axis gyroscope and 3-axis accelerometer-IMU

xMEMS Labs

- Cypress Silicon Speaker with ultrasonic modulation
- 40X louder bass response
- Solid-state, all-silicon design
- Demonstrations by appointment at CES 2024

USound

- Presenting newest audio products at CES 2024
